blocking_issues.description: security vulnerability (Memory Leak/DoS) in `src/memory/provenance/service.py`. The `track_retrieval` method allows creating retrieval history entries for memory IDs that do not exist in the provenance store. Since the LRU eviction logic in `attach_to_memory` only iterates through `_provenance_access_order` (tracked provenance items), these 'orphan' entries in `_retrieval_history` are never cleaned up, causing unbounded memory growth. This violates the explicit security requirement for bounded storage."
